solution_line_template: Quinn catches twice the amount as Alster, who caught {alster_frogs} frogs so Quinn caught {quinn_multiplier}*{alster_frogs} = <<{quinn_multiplier}*{alster_frogs}={quinn_frogs}>>{quinn_frogs} frogs
Bret catches three times the amount as Quinn who caught {quinn_frogs} frogs so Bret caught {bret_multiplier}*{quinn_frogs} = <<{bret_multiplier}*{quinn_frogs}={bret_frogs}>>{bret_frogs} frogs
